name: GCH Aviation Limited
about: GCH Aviation Limited, established in 1983 by John Currie as Garden City Helicopters, has evolved into a premier aviation group in New Zealand and the South Pacific. With over 40 years of experience, the company offers a wide range of services including certified flight training, commercial flying, air ambulance and rescue operations, and tourism activities such as scenic flights and charter services. GCH Aviation operates from multiple bases in New Zealand, including Christchurch, Kaikoura, Greymouth, Nelson, and Wellington, as well as in Fiji and Vanuatu. The group also includes a private Jet Centre and a UAV imaging division. Known for its exceptional safety record, GCH Aviation has received the New Zealand Helicopters Association Diamond Safety Award and the Qualmark Gold Sustainable Tourism Business Award. GCH Aviation continues to provide high-quality aviation services and memorable experiences.
